docs.snippet: Secretary of State Cordell Hull declared on his return from the Lima conference yesterday that the American nations had served notice on the world that they were prepared not only to defend their peace but stood ready to sponsor liberal policies of...
docs.lead_paragraph: Secretary of State Cordell Hull declared on his return from the Lima conference yesterday that the American nations had served notice on the world that they were prepared not only to defend their peace but stood ready to sponsor liberal policies of trade as the only means of alleviating recognized economic chaos and providing for "a peaceful trading world."
